description: This file declares functions related to Wi-Fi client interface (client Wi-Fi HAL). It includes function prototypes for retrieving and setting Wi-Fi station (STA) network information, such as MAC addresses, SSIDs, radio indices, and enabling/disabling stations.

methods.name: wifi_getSTANumberOfEntries
methods.description: Retrieves the number of Wi-Fi station entries.

methods.name: wifi_getSTAName
methods.description: Gets the name of a Wi-Fi station given its access point index.

methods.name: wifi_getSTARadioIndex
methods.description: Retrieves the radio index associated with a given SSID index.

methods.name: wifi_getSTAMAC
methods.description: Gets the MAC address of a Wi-Fi station based on its SSID index.

methods.name: wifi_getSTABSSID
methods.description: Gets the BSSID of a Wi-Fi station based on its SSID index.

methods.name: wifi_getSTASSID
methods.description: Gets the SSID of a Wi-Fi station based on its SSID index.

methods.name: wifi_getSTACredentials
methods.description: Retrieves credentials for a Wi-Fi station.

methods.name: wifi_getSTANetworks
methods.description: Gets the list of Wi-Fi station networks for a given access point index.

methods.name: wifi_setSTANetworks
methods.description: Sets the list of Wi-Fi station networks for a given access point index.

methods.name: wifi_getSTAEnabled
methods.description: Checks if a Wi-Fi station is enabled.

methods.name: wifi_setSTAEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables a Wi-Fi station.
